segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing on that stool, reaching for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes the whole scene feel so ordinary, but it’s anything but.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets if it keeps overflowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with it before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s stool looks like it’s about to collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a chaotic little moment in an otherwise quiet kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
